translations: n.颗粒性结膜炎，[眼科] 沙眼

phrs.translation: 沙眼, 颗粒性结膜炎, 一种慢性结膜
沙眼生物亚种, 沙眼生物变种, 沙眼生物型, 沙眼有生命的物质型
得到沙眼, 获取沙眼, 获得沙眼

sentences.sentence: One of them is trachoma: 8,000,000 people all over the world get trachoma every year.
sentences.translation: 其中之一就是沙眼：全世界每年有800万人患上沙眼。

sentences.sentence: To stop trachoma, people don't have to receive expensive medical care.
sentences.translation: 人们不必接受昂贵的医疗护理来治疗沙眼。

sentences.sentence: According to the symptoms, your trouble is trachoma.
sentences.translation: 根据这些症状判断，您患的是沙眼。
